name: Chort Devil
description: The Chort Devil is a formidable Medium fiend, known for its high armor class and substantial hit points. Its impressive Strength of 24 and Constitution of 26 make it a powerful and durable opponent in combat, while its devilish appearance adds to its menacing presence.
memorable: The Chort Devil's ability to deal significant fire damage with its attacks and its tactical use of teleportation makes it a uniquely challenging foe.
goals: Typically seeks to manipulate encounters, exert control over opponents, and dominate in combat.
relations: May be found working alongside other fiends or commanding lesser devils to achieve its goals.
environment: Often encountered in hellish realms or in demonic summoning scenarios.
strengths: Possesses high resistances to cold, fire, and poison damage, and has powerful spellcasting capabilities.
weaknesses: Relies heavily on melee attacks, making it vulnerable in ranged combat scenarios.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack capabilities, including a Claw attack that inflicts slashing and fire damage, while its Ranseur can strike from a distance.
most_powerful_ability: Hellish Weapons ability allows its attacks to deal an additional 4d6 fire damage.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 19, allowing it to spot threats effectively.
skills: Skilled in Athletics, Deception, Insight, and Perception, with notable proficiency in Charm manipulation.
additional_information: Immunities to cold, fire, and poison damage
Advantage on saving throws against spells due to Magic Resistance
Capable of seeing through magical darkness due to Devil's Sight
Can teleport up to 120 feet instantly
Can cast spells like charm person and modify memory.
spellcasting: Can cast spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability, including charm person and haste.
test_queries: medium fiend that uses fire attacks
formidable creature with high fire damage
